thread.title: Hockey hits back at BCA comments
thread.title_full: Hockey hits back at BCA comments

title: Hockey hits back at BCA comments
text:
Print 
Joe Hockey has dismissed criticism by the Business Council of Australia president about the poor quality of political leadership in Australia. 
Catherine Livingstone took aim at both sides of politics after Mr Hockey on Wednesday outlined the case for fundamental tax reform, only to have members of both major parties rule out key elements. 
"I'm not sure that a blanket attack on everyone is going to be helpful to the debate," Mr Hockey told a small business forum in Sydney on Friday. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Hockey hits back at BCA comments AAP
